noisepp::TranslatePointModule

noisepp::TranslatePointModule Class Reference

#include <NoiseTranslatePoint.h>

Inheritance diagram for noisepp::TranslatePointModule:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Transforms the source module by translating the coordinates.
